@asa_mega_mod_menu.asa_mod_toggle.$asa_description_text: Used to see the remaining health percentage of the top Bossbar
Used to see the exp progress bar percentage
Add glint effect to potions on Hotbar and Mainhand Display
Count 1 of that item on the Hotbar and Main Hand Display when that slot has only 1 item (Useless :P)
Display the number of remaining items and the number of hotbars currently selected on the HUD
Show Crosshair when you hold Egg, Snowball, Fireball and Ender Pearl when you use touch input
Organize your hotbar to be neater, and easier to interact with (For mobile devices) (Bugs prevent it from working properly)
Make Item tools have an Enchant Glint effect
Display the Clock on the screen
Display the Compass on the screen
Display the Recovery Compass on the screen (May cause your game to crash when you play in Featured Servers or Versions lower than 1.19)
View the offset ID number of the addon you are installing by holding the Stick

asa_text.text: ('The equivalent of Item AUX ID is: §d' + ($asa_item_id_offset * 65536))
You can set this in the §d$asa_item_id_offset§f section of the §dAsaBetter/ui/_global_variables.json§f file

@asa_mega_mod_menu.asa_mod_radio_toggle.$asa_description_text: Automatically adjusts position to match your input

@asa_mega_mod_menu.asa_mod_toggle.$asa_description_text: Make screen border darker when in dark area

@asa_mega_mod_menu.asa_mod_toggle.$asa_button_text: Hide Item Name when switching to empty slots

@asa_mega_mod_menu.asa_mod_radio_toggle.$asa_description_text: Displays all information of the item name, such as the Enchant line contained in that item

@asa_mega_mod_menu.asa_mod_toggle.$asa_description_text: Allows you to view the Item ID and Item Data of the item you are holding
Allows viewing the ID AUX of the item in hand
Allows viewing of Exp bar in creative mode
Allows viewing Item Counter in creative mode
